A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: this movie is an objectively bad movie. This is the result of a story with so much plotholes that it would make a good imatation for swiss cheese. Comedy that breaks the seriousness of every important character moment- A movie that doesn t respects continuity with the rest of the saga or even itself. Also we can note poor editing\, useless characters and moments that break the universe rules. That rounded by a mary sue of a character has only three saving graces.  the relation between kylo and rey\, the awesome visuals and the porgs.......fucking porgs.
